data.name: Herman Electro Demo
data.detailed_description: We combined mind-bending puzzle mechanics with a roguelike structure to create a captivating experience unlike any other. Acquire powerful supertools, conquer electrifying puzzles, discover hidden secrets, and fight for your freedom!
data.about_the_game: We combined mind-bending puzzle mechanics with a roguelike structure to create a captivating experience unlike any other. Acquire powerful supertools, conquer electrifying puzzles, discover hidden secrets, and fight for your freedom!
